content: this pretty and practical hanging plant holder is a quick project that can be whipped up in an evening or two by an intermediate crocheter it also makes a lovely gift especially if you include a potted plant dimensions about 20 inches tall and 7 inches wide can fit pots with diameters of 4 - 6 inches materials * ~ 120 yards worsted weight yarn in any color s * 5 mm crochet hook * scissors * tapestry needle * key ring notes i used three colors for this plant hanger but it would be beautiful all in one color as well dig out your bag of scraps and get creative
